abstract: Aleksandar Luković (Serbian Cyrillic: Александар Луковић; born 23 October 1982) is a Serbian footballer who plays as a defender for Zenit St. Petersburg and the Serbian national team. He is known for his aggressive style of play.
comment: Aleksandar Luković (Serbian Cyrillic: Александар Луковић; born 23 October 1982) is a Serbian footballer who plays as a defender for Zenit St. Petersburg and the Serbian national team. He is known for his aggressive style of play.
name: Aleksandar Luković
